name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandhana Yojna
description: Cash incentive of ₹5,000 in 3 installments for first child to improve maternal health.

name: One Stop Centre (Sakhi)
description: Integrated support (medical, legal, police, counselling) for violence survivors.

name: Kanyashree Prakalpa
description: Scholarship ₹1,000/yr + ₹25,000 grant for unmarried girls.

name: National Social Assistance Scheme (NSAP)
description: Pensions for elderly, widows & disabled via central assistance.

name: Janani Suraksha Yojana
description: Cash assistance to pregnant women for safe institutional delivery.

name: Mahila Shakti Kendra
description: Digital literacy, vocational training & outreach via volunteers.

name: Aapki Beti Hamari Beti
description: One‑time ₹21,000 LIC investment for girl child at birth.

name: Stand-Up India
description: Bank loans ₹10 L–₹1 Cr for SC/ST & women entrepreneurs.

name: Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Provides bank loans with subsidy to women entrepreneurs under Khadi & Village Industries Commission.

name: Mukhyamantri Majhi Ladki Bahin Yojana
description: Provides ₹1,500/month, three free LPG cylinders, and skill‑development & healthcare support.

name: National Creche Scheme
description: Supports establishment of creches for children (6 months–6 years) of working mothers in organized and unorganized sectors.

name: Working Women’s Hostel Scheme
description: Provides safe and affordable accommodation for single working women and those in vocational training or employment.

name: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
description: Entitles pregnant women and infants to free delivery, drugs, diagnostics, diet, transport and blood in public health institutions.

name: Deendayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme
description: Assist voluntary orgs to rehab persons with disabilities.

name: Mahila Samridhi Yojana (MSY)
description: Provides micro-finance to women entrepreneurs from disadvantaged backgrounds through SHGs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: Provides free LPG connection to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households to reduce health hazards from unclean cooking fuels.

name: Magalir Vidiyal Payanam
description: Free bus travel scheme for women, differently‑abled and transgender passengers—saves approx. ₹888 per month.

name: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana
description: Skill & livelihood support for women farmers.

name: Integrated Child Protection Scheme (ICPS)
description: Protection & rehabilitation for children in need of care & those in conflict with law.

name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Campaign to improve sex ratio & empower girl child through advocacy & support.

name: Rajiv Gandhi Scheme for Empowerment of Adolescent Girls (Sabla)
description: Nutrition, health and educational support to adolescent girls.

name: Thayi Bhagya Scheme
location: Karnataka (Gulbarga, Bidar, Raichur, Koppal, Bijapur, Bagalkot, Chamarajanagar)
description: Provides cashless maternal healthcare services including free delivery (normal or complicated) for women from BPL families, limited to the first two live deliveries. Treatment is provided in registered private hospitals under a public-private partnership model.

name: Kishori Shakti Yojana
description: Empower adolescent girls with education, health & vocational support.

name: Udyogini Scheme
description: Offers financial assistance and subsidies to women entrepreneurs from economically weaker backgrounds.

name: SWADHAR Greh
description: Shelter, legal & social support for marginalized women.

name: Subhadra Yojana
description: ₹10,000/year for 5 years via Aadhaar-linked DBT for women.

name: Khushi Scheme
description: Provides free sanitary napkins to girls in government and government-aided schools from Class 6 to 12 to promote menstrual hygiene and offers subsidized napkins to rural women through ASHA workers.
